title: 3 and Out - Belichick vs. Brady; Loaded AFC; Leaguewide Question Marks; Pac-12 Comeback?
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Belichick vs. Brady; Loaded AFC; Leaguewide Question Marks; Pac-12 Comeback?
description:
In this episode, John looks ahead to the Brady/Belichick blockbuster regular season matchup, looks at the loaded AFC, discusses the biggest question marks heading into the 2021 NFL season, and if the Pac-12 can make a comeback from irrelevance under new leadership. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
